categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Wolf was the name for a pair of CR90 corvettes belonging to the Rebel Alliance. The ships were part of a convoy containing supplies for a new base that was attacked by Assault Gunboats and the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Red Wind. Despite this pressure they made it into hyperspace by Keyan Farlander in an A-wing.
